text: Sri Vijayendra Saraswathi Swamigal of Sri Kanchi Kamakoti Peetam declared open the 500{+t}{+h}branch of City Union Bank at Chinthamani near T.Palur recently in the presence of N.Kamakodi, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the bank. According to a press release, the bank has planned to open 25 more branches before the end of 2015-16 to make the total number of branches 525. The bank has 1313 ATMs across the country. The bank chairman S. Balasubramanian, directors R.Mohan and T.K. Ramkumar and Senior General Manager R. Venkatasubramanian were present.
title: Bank branch declared open
